cast.overview: Prince Amleth is on the verge of becoming a man when his father is brutally murdered by his uncle, who kidnaps the boy's mother. Two decades later, Amleth is now a Viking who's on a mission to save his mother, kill his uncle and avenge his father.
cast.title: The Northman

crew.overview: Prince Amleth is on the verge of becoming a man when his father is brutally murdered by his uncle, who kidnaps the boy's mother. Two decades later, Amleth is now a Viking who's on a mission to save his mother, kill his uncle and avenge his father.
crew.title: The Northman

details.biography:
Robin Carolan is a British-Irish film composer, music producer and curator.

For 10 years, he was responsible for the acclaimed leftfield electronic record label Tri Angle and has collaborated with artists including Björk, Vessel, Lyra Pramuk, and serpentwithfeet.

In 2022, he debuted as a film composer, working with Robert Eggers on the Viking epic, ‘The Northman’. He also scored for Robert Egger’s reimagining of the silent horror classic, ‘Nosferatu’.

Information above via their homepage.
details.name: Robin Carolan
